lpspline.viz module

lpspline.viz.plot_diagnostic(model: LpRegressor, X: polars.DataFrame, ncols: int = 4, y: polars.Series | None = None)[source]

Create a plot of the learned spline components. Create a plot with at most 4 columns. Modify subplot size according to number of model splines
